title: Could a Human with the abiity to read look at my support tickets?
body:
54367

I have a few support tickets open, and the number keeps growing, that keep getting closed without anyone answering my questions.  Each one has a different question in it but each time the support people either; do not give an answer and close the ticket, or they give a brief answer that does NOT answer the question some of which make me wonder if you have illiterates working for support.

Could maybe someone actually read the ticket, or am I wrong in thinking that is the support persons job to read and reply.

replies.body:
Hey alaskaneagle.

About a month or two ago, you received a suspension due to toxic behavior in-game.  When you initially wrote in about this, one of the Player Behavior Specialists responded to you and explained your actions and why they are not 'ok' in League of Legends.  

Creating multiple new tickets will not help in getting your questions answered faster.  One of our Player Behavior Rioters has already responded to your ticket and will be responsible for your questions.

If you have further questions, make sure to respond to your original ticket.

54367

yea it's been that long and I've been being given a round around ever since.  I had once ticket open but then you guys closed it after a couple months of runaround.

The "multiple tickets" are all different.  Every one of them.  And all the responses are half bots, half half-assed and NONE answer a single question....  

" If you have further questions, make sure to respond to your original ticket."... are you just responding with a pre-made phrase?  The original ticket was closed.  which is why I had to make new tickets, though if you look and again they are ALL DIFFERENT... Let me guess that confused your answer bot programs.  Is that why its been a month and not a single question (there were 5 I think) were answered?

Hi alaskaneagle,

If this is an account/billing related issue, support tickets are the only way to get this actioned - Riot don't tend to look at this forum **too** much, as it's mainly for Player to Player support.

If it's more of a technical enquiry/issue, posting the details here might help as someone may be able to assist with isn't a Riot employee.
Oh, snap. A wrench. I think you're the same one I ran into before though. I remember that weird name.

54367

one of them is, but 5 or 6 of them aren't.  It looks like someone comes in first thing in the morning and closes my tickets.  So I reopen them every day but often I either get a response that has nothing to do with my questions or no response at all.

54367

I can't seem to get a straight answer from the support department, maybe I can get an answer here.  Why is saying "stfu braum you suck" considered worse and more punishable than saying "you are a retarded ni gger"

I'm really wondering about that...

54367

I couldn't even get an answer to why I don't have different  poros following me on the temp mode... Riot support is worthless

54367

O look all of them were closed without my questions answered. 

each one had TWO QUESTIONS.  

You all illiterate or what?

Can people stop down voting the OP? Seriously if you have ever dealt with Riot Support you will know they are useless. BUMP THIS OP SO THEY DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT. You cant actually get anything solved because it takes them a day or two to answer you, then you reply and wait a few more days. This is simple, get a customer service line. Even if it is just online chat. They tell people to go to support for an issue that could be fixed in minutes takes a week or two and doesn't get solved. Its ridiculous.
